artist: Paul Jacoulet; Carved by Maeda Kentarō; Printed by Fujii Shūnosuke
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by May McBride Guarisco
description: mother with white and pink robe cradles a baby wearing red coat, tan bottom, and tasseled, embroidered shoes; baby's PR hand is the neck of the mother's garment
marks: Signature and Marks LRC, in pencil: [Paul Jacoulet]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: The Treasure, Korea
